sections.heading: subpoena; witness fee; return; cost
sections.text: (1) The witness fee for one day's attendance must be served with a trial subpoena except when the subpoena is issued (a) at the request of an agency of state government or (b) pursuant to section 25-2304.(2) The person serving the subpoena shall make a return of s

sections.heading: not applicable to criminal cases. Huckins v. State, 61 Neb. 871, 86 N.W. 485 (1901).
sections.text: not applicable to criminal cases. Huckins v. State, 61 Neb. 871, 86 N.W. 485 (1901).
